q: TV judge Simon Cowell have a great deal in common. Simon Cowell has judged American Idol and The X Factor, and is renowned for being open and honest with singers he thinks aren't up to scratch. I think Sue Sylvester has British in her. I think the US look at the British as a race that tells it how it is. And if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her, she told British newspaper The Sun.`` He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so, David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' that he's done for me, for the government and for the country,'' David Cameron said. Opposition leader Ed Miliband said his Labour Party had been proved right to question Andy Coulson 's position. Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him, Ed Miliband said. The government is pushing through harsh spending cuts to tackle a record budget deficit.
